entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Local blowing snow late in the morning. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 13 March 2023
